snippet.title: Rogue Piñatas: VRmageddon - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A multiplayer VR roguelite game. Your mission? Survive the party-apocalyptic world by bashing your way through swarms of invading Piñatas, where every swing could mean survival or sweet defeat!

Game Features at Launch:
• 6+ Different Characters to Choose
• 12+ Weapons to Master
• 17+ Ingenious Gadgets
• Online Multiplayer
• 30+ Piñata Enemies
• 6+ Piñata Bosses
• 6+ World-Ending Locations
• Hidden Secrets

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2700990/Rogue_Piatas_VRmageddon/
Wishlist on Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/experiences/5316449838479945/
Get notified on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nerdninjas/rogue-pinatas-vrmageddon

- - - -

Learn more about Nerd Ninjas: https://nerdninjas.com/
 We are a video game studio of digital mercenaries masterfully trained in game development and electronic arts, creeping silently in the shadows to slay any project that crosses our path! We are relentless in our pursuit of making the highest quality games and our studio continues to stand as a best-in-class developer, serving as the golden standard for performance and environment-building using the Meta Horizon Worlds platform.

- - - -

Let’s connect on social:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nerdninjas/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NerdNinjas/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@nerd.ninjas/
